options.label: Device is on, LED is off; device is off, LED is on
Device is on, LED is on; device is off, LED is off
Dim up/down the light to the specified level quickly by command except value 0 and ff
Dim up/down the light to the specified level slowly by command except value 0 and ff
Press two times on button and two times off button, LED will flash 5 times if device is successfully excluded
Normal operation, press any button to exclude device
Press two times on button and two times off button, LED will flash 5 times if device is successfully excluded

paramInformation.label: Minimum Dim Threshold
paramInformation.description: Set the minimum dimmer threshold when manually or remotely controlled

paramInformation.label: Maximum Brightness Threshold
paramInformation.description: Set the maximum brightness threshold when manually or remotely controlled

metadata.inclusion:
Adding your device to a Z-Wave network
1. Follow the instructions for your Z-Wave certified controller to
add a device to the Z-Wave network.
2. Once the controller is ready to add your device, press
and release the top or bottom of the wireless smart dimmer
(rocker)
metadata.exclusion:
To remove and reset the device
1. Follow the instructions for your Z-Wave certified controller to
remove a device from the Z-Wave network.
2. Once the controller is ready to remove your device, press
and release the top or bottom of the wireless smart dimmer
(rocker)
metadata.reset:
1. Quickly press ON (top) button three times then immediately
press the OFF (bottom) button three times. The LED will flash
ON/OFF five times when completed successfully.
Note: This should only be used if your networkâ€™s primary
controller is missing or otherwise inoperable
